alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 7:29AM CDT until June 27 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Hempstead County in southwestern Arkansas... West central Nevada County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 728 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Washington, or 10 miles southeast of Nashville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hope, Emmet, Perrytown, Washington, Ozan, Patmos, Oakhaven, Sutton and Laneburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
